net.kencochrane.raven

Class RavenFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kencochrane.raven.RavenFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultRavenFactory

    public abstract class RavenFactory
extends Object
    Factory in charge of creating Raven instances.

    The factories register themselves through the ServiceLoader system.
